title: #230 - Egalitarianism
itunes:title: #230 - Egalitarianism
description: When did a fancy word for "equality" get hijacked by Men's Rights Activists and internet charlatans? This week, Dan goes off on one of his incredibly inelegant rants in an attempt to explain the true meaning of egalitarianism to young Connor (with a little help from American philosopher John Rawls). This episode is sponsored by the Committee To Eat Jeff Bezos and Steal All His Money.
